tool_description: Get data from Etherscan. Access collection information, NFT tokens, and transactions. New features will be added soon!

api_list.name: Collection Info
api_list.description: Retrieve information about a specific NFT collection, including the number of tokens, total transfers, and minimum price.

required_parameters.name: collection_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the NFT collection.

api_list.name: NFT Transactions
api_list.description: Get NFT transactions for a specific collection and token.

required_parameters.name: collection_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the NFT collection.

required_parameters.name: token_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the specific NFT token.

api_list.name: NFT Info
api_list.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific NFT within a collection.

required_parameters.name: collection_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the NFT collection.

required_parameters.name: token_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the specific NFT token.

api_list.name: Collection Tokens
api_list.description: Get a list of tokens within a specific NFT collection.

required_parameters.name: collection_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the NFT collection.
